metadata.description:
Surface evapotranspiration (ET) is an important link of water cycle and energy transmission in the earth system. The accurate acquisition of ET is helpful to the study of global climate change, crop yield estimation, drought monitoring, and has important guiding significance for regional and even global water resources planning and management. With the development of remote sensing technology, remote sensing estimation of surface evapotranspiration has become an effective way to obtain regional and global evapotranspiration. At present, a variety of low and medium resolution surface evapotranspiration products have been produced and released in business. However, there are still many uncertainties in the model mechanism, input data, parameterization scheme of remote sensing estimation of surface evapotranspiration model. Therefore, it is necessary to use the real method. The accuracy of remote sensing estimation of evapotranspiration products was quantitatively evaluated by sex test. However, in the process of authenticity test, there is a problem of spatial scale mismatch between the remote sensing estimation value of surface evapotranspiration and the site observation value, so the key is to obtain the relative truth value of satellite pixel scale surface evapotranspiration.

Based on the flux observation matrix of "multi-scale observation experiment of non-uniform underlying surface evaporation" in the middle reaches of Heihe River Basin from June to September 2012, the stations 4 (Village), 5 (corn), 6 (corn), 7 (corn), 8 (corn), 11 (corn), 12 (corn), 13 (corn), 14 (corn), 15 (corn), 17 (orchard) and the lower reaches of January to December 2014 Oasis Populus euphratica forest station (Populus euphratica forest), mixed forest station (Tamarix / Populus euphratica), bare land station (bare land), farmland station (melon), sidaoqiao station (Tamarix) observation data (automatic meteorological station, eddy correlator, large aperture scintillation meter, etc.) are used as auxiliary data, and the high-resolution remote sensing data (surface temperature, vegetation index, net radiation, etc.) are used as auxiliary data. See Fig. 1 for the distribution map. Considering the land Through direct test and cross test, six scale expansion methods (area weight method, scale expansion method based on Priestley Taylor formula, unequal weight surface to surface regression Kriging method, artificial neural network, random forest, depth belief network) were compared and analyzed, and finally a comprehensive method (on the underlying surface) was optimized. The area weight method is used when the underlying surface is moderately inhomogeneous; the unequal weight surface to surface regression Kriging method is used when the underlying surface is moderately inhomogeneous; the random forest method is used when the underlying surface is highly inhomogeneous) to obtain the relative true value (spatial resolution of 1km) of the surface evapotranspiration pixel scale of MODIS satellite transit instantaneous / day in the middle and lower reaches of the flux observation matrix area respectively, and to observe through the scintillation with large aperture. The results show that the overall accuracy of the data set is good. The average absolute percentage error (MAPE) of the pixel scale relative truth instantaneous and day-to-day is 2.6% and 4.5% for the midstream satellite, and 9.7% and 12.7% for the downstream satellite, respectively. It can be used to verify other remote sensing products. The evapotranspiration data of the pixel can not only solve the problem of spatial mismatch between the remote sensing estimation value and the station observation value, but also represent the uncertainty of the verification process. For all site information and scale expansion methods, please refer to Li et al. (2018) and Liu et al. (2016), and for observation data processing, please refer to Liu et al. (2016).
metadata.descriptionCn:
地表蒸散发（Evapotranspiration，ET）是地球系统中水循环和能量传输的重要环节，地表蒸散发的准确获取有助于全球气候变化、作物估产、干旱监测等研究，并且对区域乃至全球水资源规划管理具有重要的指导意义。随着遥感技术的发展，遥感估算地表蒸散发已成为获取区域与全球蒸散发的一个有效途径，目前多种中低分辨率地表蒸散发产品已业务化生产和发布，但遥感估算地表蒸散发模型在模型机理、输入数据、参数化方案等方面仍存在许多不确定性，因此，需要通过真实性检验来定量评价遥感估算地表蒸散发产品的精度。但在真实性检验过程中，存在地表蒸散发遥感估算值与站点观测值的空间尺度不匹配问题，因此卫星像元尺度地表蒸散发的相对真值获取是关键。
以黑河流域综合观测网2012年6-9月中游“非均匀下垫面地表蒸散发的多尺度观测试验”中通量观测矩阵的4（村庄）、5（玉米）、6（玉米）、7（玉米）、8（玉米）、11（玉米）、12（玉米）、13（玉米）、14（玉米）、15（玉米）、17（果园）号站和2014-2015年1-12月下游绿洲胡杨林站（胡杨林）、混合林站（柽柳/胡杨）、裸地站（裸地）、农田站（甜瓜）、四道桥站（柽柳）观测数据（自动气象站、涡动相关仪、大孔径闪烁仪等）为基础，以高分辨率遥感数据(地表温度、植被指数、净辐射等)作为辅助数据，分布图见图1，考虑地表异质性对ET尺度扩展的影响，通过直接检验和交叉检验对6种尺度扩展方法（面积权重法、基于Priestley-Taylor公式的尺度扩展方法、不等权重面到面回归克里格方法、人工神经网络、随机森林、深度信念网络）进行比较和分析，最终优选一种综合的方法(在下垫面均匀时，采用面积权重法；在下垫面中度非均匀时，采用不等权重面到面回归克里格方法；下垫面高度非均匀时采用随机森林方法)分别获取中游和下游通量观测矩阵区域MODIS卫星过境瞬时/日的地表蒸散发像元尺度相对真值(空间分辨率为1km)，并通过与大孔径闪烁仪观测值（参考值）进行验证分析，结果表明：该数据集整体精度良好，中游卫星像元尺度相对真值瞬时和逐日的平均绝对百分误差(MAPE)分别为2.6%和4.5%，下游卫星像元尺度相对真值瞬时和逐日的MAPE分别为9.7%和12.7%，可以用来验证其它遥感产品。该像元地表蒸散发数据既能解决遥感估算值与站点观测值的空间不匹配问题，又能表征验证过程的不确定性。所有站点信息和尺度扩展方法请参考Li et al. (2018)和 Liu et al. (2016)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2016)。

background: Upscaling of eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface is a grand challenge. Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. HiWATER is an experiment designed to address this challenge through instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data.
challenges: Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations.
methods: Several intensive observation periods (IOPs) and continuous hydrometeorological observations were carried out during HiWATER. Only data collected during the IOP in 2012 are presented in this paper. Instruments for the oasis-desert system were arranged in hierarchically nested scales to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. We established a sparse network to investigate the oasis-desert interaction. One superstation was constructed within the oasis, and four EC towers and four two-layer automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) were installed in different landscapes surrounding the oasis, including sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland. Intensive observations were implemented at the irrigation district scale. A total of 12 airborne remote sensing missions were conducted to cover the FEA using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, a multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer.
dataset: We introduce a multiscale dataset obtained from Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) in an oasis-desert area in 2012. The HiWATER observation system consists of a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations; an eco-hydrological sensor network of soil moisture and leaf area index; hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer; and synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes. All observational data were carefully quality controlled throughout sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and datasets generation. The data are freely available at figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
backgroundCn: 在异质表面上生态水文过程的上升尺度是一个重大挑战。该领域的进展受到多尺度观测数据稀缺的制约。HiWATER实验旨在通过在分层嵌套尺度上进行仪器布置，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据，从而应对这一挑战。
challengesCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍。
methodsCn: 在HiWATER期间进行了几次密集观测期（IOPs）和连续的水文气象观测。本文仅展示了2012年IOP期间收集的数据。为捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，绿洲-沙漠系统的仪器按照层次嵌套的尺度进行布置。我们建立了一个稀疏网络，以研究绿洲-沙漠的相互作用。在绿洲内建造了一个超级站，并在绿洲周围不同的景观中安装了四个EC塔和四个两层自动气象站（AMS），这些景观包括沙漠、沙漠铺装、沙漠草原和湿地。在灌溉区尺度上实施了密集观测。共进行了12次航空遥感任务，使用LiDAR、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计覆盖了FEA。
datasetCn: 我们介绍了一个多尺度数据集，该数据集来自2012年在绿洲-沙漠地区进行的黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）。HiWATER观测系统由涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站组成的通量观测矩阵；土壤湿度和叶面积指数的生态水文传感器网络；使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感；以及同步的植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。所有观测数据在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成过程中都经过了严格的质量控制。这些数据可在figshare和寒区与干旱区科学数据中心免费获取。

background: Land surface evapotranspiration (ET) is an important component of the surface energy budget and water cycle. To solve the problem of the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ observations and remotely sensed ET, it is necessary to find the most appropriate upscaling approach for acquiring ground truth ET data at the satellite pixel scale.
research objective: In summary, this study was based on two matrices data from the HiWATER experiment: the MUSOEXE conducted in the middle stream of the Heihe River Basin (HRB) from May to September in 2012 and the Hydrometeorological Observation Network conducted in the downstream of the HRB from 2013 to 2015. Although there are many upscaling methods, most upscaling methods currently developed for ET are in the exploratory stage. Due to the heterogeneity of the underlying surfaces and the complexity of near-surface meteorological conditions, the applicability of different upscaling methods varies, and each method has cons and pros. Therefore, carrying out a comparative study of various upscaling methods is necessary in order to determine the most appropriate upscaling method over heterogeneous surfaces to obtain ground truth ET data at the satellite pixel scale and to reduce uncertainty due to spatial-scale mismatch in the validation process.
challenges: A major problem is the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ measurements and RS_ET products. Therefore, it is important to select appropriate validation pixels. Although the problem of spatial-scale mismatch can be partially addressed, the heterogeneity of the subpixel will have a greater impact on the results of the validation. The applicability of different upscaling methods varies, and each method has cons and pros.
methods: Based on a data set from two flux observation matrices in the middle stream and downstream of the Heihe River Basin, six upscaling methods were intercompared via direct validation and cross validation.
dataset: Based on a data set from two flux observation matrices in the middle stream and downstream of the Heihe River Basin.
findings: The results showed that the area-weighted method performed better than the other five upscaling methods introducing auxiliary variables (the integrated Priestley-Taylor equation, weighted area-to-area regression kriging [WATARK], artificial neural network, random forest [RF], and deep belief network methods) over homogeneous underlying surfaces. Over moderately heterogeneous underlying surfaces, the WATARK method performed better. However, the RF method performed better over highly heterogeneous underlying surfaces.
backgroundCn: 地表蒸散发（ET）是表面能量预算和水循环的重要组成部分。为了解决地面观测与遥感ET之间的空间尺度不匹配问题，有必要找到最合适的上尺度方法，以获取卫星像素尺度的真实地面ET数据。
research objectiveCn: 本研究基于HiWATER实验的两个矩阵数据：2012年5月至9月在黑河流域中游进行的MUSOEXE实验和2013年至2015年在黑河流域下游进行的水文气象观测网络。尽管目前有许多上尺度方法，但大多数针对蒸散发（ET）的上尺度方法仍处于探索阶段。由于地表的异质性和近地面气象条件的复杂性，不同上尺度方法的适用性各异，每种方法都有其优缺点。因此，进行各种上尺度方法的比较研究是必要的，以确定在异质表面上最合适的上尺度方法，从而在卫星像素尺度上获得真实的ET数据，并减少验证过程中由于空间尺度不匹配带来的不确定性。
challengesCn: 一个主要问题是现场测量与遥感蒸散发（RS_ET）产品之间的空间尺度不匹配。因此，选择合适的验证像素非常重要。尽管空间尺度不匹配的问题可以部分解决，但子像素的异质性对验证结果的影响会更大。不同的上采样方法的适用性各不相同，每种方法都有其优缺点。
methodsCn: 根据来自黑河流域中游和下游的两个通量观测矩阵的数据集，通过直接验证和交叉验证对六种上尺度方法进行了比较。
datasetCn: 基于来自黑河流域中游和下游的两个通量观测矩阵的数据集。
findingsCn: 结果显示，面积加权方法在均匀底层表面上表现优于其他五种引入辅助变量的上采样方法（集成Priestley-Taylor方程、加权区域到区域回归克里金法[WATARK]、人工神经网络、随机森林[RF]和深度信念网络方法）。在中等异质性的底层表面上，WATARK方法表现更好。然而，在高度异质性的底层表面上，RF方法表现更佳。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'upscaling' mean in the context of evapotranspiration data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在蒸散数据收集的背景下，“尺度提升”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of evapotranspiration data collection, 'upscaling' refers to the process of adjusting in situ observations to match the spatial scale of remotely sensed data. It involves using various methods to extend ground truth ET data to the satellite pixel scale, addressing the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ measurements and remotely sensed ET products.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在蒸散发数据收集的背景下，“上尺度”指的是将现场观测数据调整到与遥感数据的空间尺度相匹配的过程。它涉及使用各种方法将地面真实的蒸散发数据扩展到卫星像素尺度，以解决现场测量与遥感蒸散发产品之间的空间尺度不匹配问题。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'flux observation matrix' entail in the context of eco-hydrological research?

Definition.AnswerEn: In eco-hydrological research, a 'flux observation matrix' typically includes a network of instruments like eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations. These tools are used to capture multiscale eco-hydrological processes and provide comprehensive data for understanding interactions between different landscape elements, such as in the HiWATER experiment.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在生态水文研究中，“通量观测矩阵”通常包括一系列仪器，如涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站。这些工具用于捕捉多尺度的生态水文过程，并提供全面的数据，以理解不同景观元素之间的相互作用，例如在HiWATER实验中。

Comparison.AnswerEn: The intensive observation periods (IOPs) involved a focused collection of data using instruments arranged in hierarchically nested scales, capturing eco-hydrological processes through instruments like LiDAR and multi-angle thermal imagers. Continuous hydrometeorological observations involved ongoing data gathering using a sparse network of instruments such as EC towers and automatic meteorological stations.

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the potential benefits and challenges of using multiple upscaling methods for estimating evapotranspiration at a satellite pixel scale?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在卫星像素尺度上使用多种上采样方法估算蒸散发的潜在好处和挑战是什么？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The use of multiple upscaling methods can provide flexibility and potentially increase the accuracy of evapotranspiration estimates by selecting the most appropriate method based on the heterogeneity of the underlying surface. However, challenges include the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ measurements and remotely sensed data, as well as the varying applicability and pros and cons of each method, which can affect the validation and accuracy of the estimates.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用多种上采样方法可以提供灵活性，并通过根据基础表面的异质性选择最合适的方法来潜在地提高蒸散发估算的准确性。然而，挑战包括现场测量与遥感数据之间的空间尺度不匹配，以及每种方法的适用性和优缺点的不同，这可能影响估算的验证和准确性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How does the heterogeneity of the underlying surface influence the choice of data collection methods and the accuracy of evapotranspiration measurements?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 底层表面的异质性如何影响数据收集方法的选择以及蒸散发测量的准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The heterogeneity of the underlying surface significantly influences which data collection methods are used and the accuracy of evapotranspiration measurements. For homogeneous surfaces, simpler methods like area-weighted upscaling may suffice, whereas more complex methods such as weighted area-to-area regression kriging or random forest may be needed for moderately to highly heterogeneous surfaces. This variability impacts the effectiveness of the measurement and the level of uncertainty in the results.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 底层表面的异质性显著影响数据收集方法的选择以及蒸散发测量的准确性。对于均匀表面，简单的方法如面积加权上采样可能就足够，而对于中等到高度异质的表面，则可能需要更复杂的方法，如加权面积到面积的回归克里金法或随机森林。这种变异性影响了测量的有效性和结果的不确定性水平。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying causes of spatial-scale mismatch between in situ measurements and remotely sensed evapotranspiration data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在地面测量和遥感蒸散发数据之间的空间尺度不匹配的潜在原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The spatial-scale mismatch arises because in situ measurements are often taken at a fine scale, while remotely sensed data cover larger areas, leading to discrepancies. Additionally, the heterogeneity of the underlying surfaces and the complexity of near-surface meteorological conditions further exacerbate this mismatch, impacting validation results.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 空间尺度不匹配的产生是因为现场测量通常在较细的尺度上进行，而遥感数据覆盖更大区域，从而导致差异。此外，基础表面的异质性和近地面气象条件的复杂性进一步加剧了这种不匹配，影响了验证结果。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it important to select appropriate validation pixels when dealing with evapotranspiration data from heterogeneous surfaces?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在处理来自异质表面的蒸散数据时，为什么选择适当的验证像素很重要？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Selecting appropriate validation pixels is crucial because the spatial-scale mismatch can be partially addressed by choosing pixels that accurately represent the variability within the area. This helps to reduce uncertainty and improve the reliability of the validation process, especially in heterogeneous surfaces where subpixel variations can significantly affect results.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 选择适当的验证像素至关重要，因为空间尺度的不匹配可以通过选择准确代表该区域内变异性的像素来部分解决。这有助于减少不确定性，提高验证过程的可靠性，特别是在异质表面上，亚像素的变化可能会显著影响结果。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the difficulty in determining the most appropriate upscaling method for obtaining ground truth evapotranspiration data at the satellite pixel scale?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 确定最合适的上采样方法以获取卫星像素尺度的真实蒸散发数据的困难因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The difficulty in selecting the best upscaling method is due to the heterogeneity of the underlying surfaces and the varying complexity of near-surface meteorological conditions. Each upscaling method has its strengths and weaknesses, and their applicability can differ widely depending on these factors, making it challenging to identify a universally optimal approach.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 选择最佳上采样方法的困难在于基础表面的异质性和近地面气象条件的复杂性各异。每种上采样方法都有其优缺点，适用性因这些因素而异，这使得识别一种普遍最佳的方法变得具有挑战性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ observations and remotely sensed data affect the accuracy of evapotranspiration models?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 现场观测与遥感数据之间的空间尺度不匹配如何影响蒸散发模型的准确性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The spatial-scale mismatch can introduce uncertainties in the validation process of evapotranspiration models, as it affects the ability to accurately capture the heterogeneity of the underlying surface, leading to potential inaccuracies in model outputs.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 空间尺度不匹配可能会在蒸散发模型的验证过程中引入不确定性，因为它影响了准确捕捉基础表面的异质性的能力，从而导致模型输出的潜在不准确性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What outcomes can be achieved by applying different upscaling methods over heterogeneous surfaces for evapotranspiration data validation?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 通过对异质表面应用不同的上采样方法，可以实现哪些结果，以验证蒸散发数据？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Applying different upscaling methods over heterogeneous surfaces can lead to varying levels of accuracy in evapotranspiration data validation, with methods like area-weighted techniques performing better over homogeneous surfaces, while methods such as weighted area-to-area regression kriging and random forest perform better over moderately and highly heterogeneous surfaces respectively.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在异质表面上应用不同的上采样方法可能导致蒸散发数据验证的准确性水平不同，区域加权技术在均质表面上表现更好，而加权区域到区域回归克里金法和随机森林在中度和高度异质表面上表现更好。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the main objectives of employing multiscale observation systems like HiWATER for data collection in oasis-desert environments?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠环境中，采用多尺度观测系统如HiWATER进行数据收集的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The main objectives of employing multiscale observation systems like HiWATER are to capture the complex, multi-scale eco-hydrological processes in oasis-desert environments. This involves using instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to gather diverse and comprehensive data that address the challenges posed by the heterogeneity of the surface and the availability of multiscale observations, ultimately aiding in the investigation of oasis-desert interactions and improving the understanding of these systems.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 采用多尺度观测系统如HiWATER的主要目标是捕捉绿洲-沙漠环境中复杂的多尺度生态水文过程。这涉及在分层嵌套的尺度上使用仪器收集多样化和全面的数据，以应对表面异质性和多尺度观测可用性带来的挑战，最终有助于研究绿洲-沙漠相互作用并提高对这些系统的理解。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why might it be necessary to perform a comparative study of various upscaling methods for evapotranspiration data in heterogeneous landscapes?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么有必要对异质景观中的蒸散数据的各种放大方法进行比较研究？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: A comparative study of various upscaling methods is necessary because the heterogeneity of underlying surfaces and the complexity of near-surface meteorological conditions can affect the applicability and effectiveness of different upscaling methods. By evaluating the pros and cons of each method, researchers can determine the most suitable approach for reducing uncertainty due to spatial-scale mismatch and acquiring accurate evapotranspiration data at the satellite pixel scale over heterogeneous landscapes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 对各种上采样方法的比较研究是必要的，因为基础表面的异质性和近地面气象条件的复杂性可能会影响不同上采样方法的适用性和有效性。通过评估每种方法的优缺点，研究人员可以确定最合适的方法，以减少由于空间尺度不匹配带来的不确定性，并在异质景观上以卫星像素尺度获取准确的蒸散发数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are multi-scale eco-hydrological processes observed and recorded in the Heihe River Basin using remote sensing and ground instruments?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在黑河流域，如何利用遥感和地面仪器观察和记录多尺度生态水文过程？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In the Heihe River Basin, multi-scale eco-hydrological processes are observed using a combination of flux observation matrices, including eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations. Additionally, a sensor network for soil moisture and leaf area index, as well as hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer, is utilized. Synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes are also part of the data collection method.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在黑河流域，采用包括涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站在内的通量观测矩阵，观察多尺度生态水文过程。此外，还利用土壤湿度和叶面积指数传感器网络，以及使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感。同步的地面测量也包括植被动态和光合作用过程的数据收集方法。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodological approaches are used to address the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ observations and remote-sensed evapotranspiration data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了解决地面观测与遥感蒸散发数据之间的空间尺度不匹配，采用了哪些方法论方法？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To address the spatial-scale mismatch, several upscaling methods are used, such as the area-weighted method, integrated Priestley-Taylor equation, weighted area-to-area regression kriging, artificial neural network, random forest, and deep belief network methods. These methods are compared via direct validation and cross-validation to determine their applicability over heterogeneous surfaces and to acquire ground truth evapotranspiration data at the satellite pixel scale.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了解决空间尺度不匹配的问题，使用了几种上采样方法，如面积加权法、集成Priestley-Taylor方程、加权面积到面积回归克里金法、人工神经网络、随机森林和深度信念网络方法。这些方法通过直接验证和交叉验证进行比较，以确定它们在异质表面上的适用性，并获取卫星像素尺度的地面真实蒸散发数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to ensure the quality control of observational data collected during the HiWATER experiment in the Heihe River Basin?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在黑河流域的HiWATER实验中，确保观测数据质量控制的程序有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The quality control of observational data collected during the HiWATER experiment is ensured through careful processes that include sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and dataset generation. This meticulous approach is applied to the various instruments and methodologies used in the experiment to maintain the integrity and reliability of the data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验中收集的观测数据的质量控制通过仔细的过程得以确保，包括传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成。这种细致的方法应用于实验中使用的各种仪器和方法，以维护数据的完整性和可靠性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What observational techniques and instrumentation are necessary to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous surfaces?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在异质表面捕捉多尺度生态水文过程所需的观测技术和仪器是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales, including flux observation matrices of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, automatic meteorological stations, eco-hydrological sensor networks, and hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometers, multi-angle thermal imagers, and L-band microwave radiometers, are necessary to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous surfaces.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在层次嵌套的尺度上进行仪器测量，包括涡度协方差塔的通量观测矩阵、大孔径闪烁仪、自动气象站、生态水文传感器网络，以及使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感，对于捕捉异质表面的多尺度生态水文过程是必要的。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do different upscaling methods enable the acquisition of ground truth evapotranspiration data at the satellite pixel scale over heterogeneous surfaces?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 不同的上采样方法如何使得在异质表面上以卫星像素尺度获取真实蒸散发数据成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Different upscaling methods such as area-weighted method, integrated Priestley-Taylor equation, weighted area-to-area regression kriging (WATARK), artificial neural networks, random forest, and deep belief network methods enable the acquisition of ground truth evapotranspiration data at the satellite pixel scale by addressing the spatial-scale mismatch and considering the heterogeneity of underlying surfaces.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 不同的上采样方法，如面积加权法、集成Priestley-Taylor方程、加权面积到面积回归克里金法（WATARK）、人工神经网络、随机森林和深度信念网络方法，通过解决空间尺度不匹配并考虑基础表面的异质性，使得在卫星像素尺度上获取地面真实的蒸散发数据成为可能。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What are the necessary conditions for selecting appropriate validation pixels to address the spatial-scale mismatch in remotely sensed evapotranspiration products?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 选择适当的验证像素以解决遥感蒸散发产品中的空间尺度不匹配的必要条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: It is necessary to select validation pixels that account for the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ measurements and remotely sensed evapotranspiration products. The heterogeneity of the subpixel must be considered, as it can significantly impact the validation results. Selecting appropriate upscaling methods based on the underlying surface heterogeneity also helps in addressing this challenge.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 必须选择验证像素，以考虑现场测量与遥感蒸散发产品之间的空间尺度不匹配。必须考虑子像素的异质性，因为这会显著影响验证结果。根据基础表面异质性选择适当的上采样方法也有助于解决这一挑战。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What factors could contribute to the selection of different upscaling methods for evapotranspiration data at varying levels of surface heterogeneity?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 影响在不同表面异质性水平上选择不同蒸散发数据上采样方法的因素有哪些？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The applicability of different upscaling methods varies with the heterogeneity of the underlying surfaces and the complexity of near-surface meteorological conditions. Over homogeneous surfaces, area-weighted methods perform better, while methods like weighted area-to-area regression kriging and random forest perform better over moderately and highly heterogeneous surfaces, respectively.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 不同的上采样方法的适用性因基础表面的异质性和近地面气象条件的复杂性而异。在均匀表面上，加权面积法表现更好，而在中等和高度异质表面上，像加权面积到面积回归克里金法和随机森林这样的算法表现更好。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is the generation of pixel-scale ground truth evapotranspiration data considered essential for validating remotely sensed ET products?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么生成像素级地面真实蒸散数据被认为对验证遥感蒸散产品至关重要？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Generating pixel-scale ground truth ET data is essential to address the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ observations and remotely sensed ET estimates. This process helps reduce uncertainty in the validation process, allowing for a more accurate comparison of remotely sensed products with ground truth data.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 生成像素级的地面真实蒸散发（ET）数据对于解决现场观测与遥感ET估计之间的空间尺度不匹配至关重要。这个过程有助于减少验证过程中的不确定性，从而使遥感产品与地面真实数据的比较更加准确。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How effective are the current data collection methods in addressing the challenge of spatial-scale mismatch in evapotranspiration studies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 当前的数据收集方法在解决蒸散发研究中的空间尺度不匹配问题方面的有效性如何？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The current data collection methods, including flux observation matrices and high-resolution remote sensing, are effective to some extent in addressing the spatial-scale mismatch. However, the challenge remains significant due to the heterogeneity of subpixel variations, which impacts the validation of remotely sensed evapotranspiration data.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 当前的数据收集方法，包括通量观测矩阵和高分辨率遥感，在一定程度上有效地解决了空间尺度不匹配的问题。然而，由于亚像素变化的异质性，仍然存在显著的挑战，这影响了遥感蒸散发数据的验证。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your view, how might future research refine or expand the existing datasets to improve the accuracy of evapotranspiration measurements at the satellite pixel scale?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，未来的研究如何细化或扩展现有数据集，以提高卫星像素尺度上蒸散发测量的准确性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Future research could refine existing datasets by developing more precise upscaling methods that account for surface heterogeneity and improving the integration of auxiliary data, such as vegetation indices and net radiation. Cross-validation techniques and the use of machine learning models like random forest might also enhance the accuracy and reliability of measurements.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 未来的研究可以通过开发更精确的上升方法来改进现有数据集，这些方法考虑到表面异质性，并改善辅助数据的整合，例如植被指数和净辐射。交叉验证技术和使用随机森林等机器学习模型也可能提高测量的准确性和可靠性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how different upscaling methods can address the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ measurements and remote sensing evapotranspiration products.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白不同的上采样方法如何解决现场测量与遥感蒸散发产品之间的空间尺度不匹配问题。

These methods are compared through direct and cross-validation to determine which is most appropriate over different levels of surface heterogeneity. For example, area-weighted method is effective over homogeneous surfaces, while random forest performs better over highly heterogeneous surfaces.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 各种上采样方法，如面积加权法、加权面积-面积回归克里金法、人工神经网络、随机森林和深度置信网络，被用来解决地面测量与遥感蒸散发产品之间的空间尺度不匹配问题。这些方法通过直接验证和交叉验证进行比较，以确定在不同表面异质性水平下哪种方法最为合适。例如，面积加权法在均匀表面上有效，而随机森林在高度异质的表面上表现更好。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges faced in acquiring multiscale observations for eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous landscapes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在异质景观中获取生态水文过程的多尺度观测所面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The major challenge in acquiring multiscale observations for eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous landscapes is the poor availability of multiscale data. This is compounded by the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ observations and remotely sensed data. To address this, experiments like HiWATER use instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales, including flux observation matrices, eco-hydrological sensor networks, and hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing, to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 获取异质景观中生态水文过程的多尺度观测的主要挑战是多尺度数据的可用性差。这一问题因地面观测与遥感数据之间的空间尺度不匹配而加剧。为了解决这个问题，像HiWATER这样的实验使用分层嵌套尺度的仪器，包括通量观测矩阵、生态水文传感器网络和超高分辨率的航空遥感，以捕捉多尺度的生态水文过程。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how the heterogeneity of the surface impacts the applicability of different upscaling methods for evapotranspiration data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解表面异质性如何影响不同上采样方法在蒸散发数据中的适用性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The heterogeneity of the surface impacts the applicability of different upscaling methods because each method has varying strengths and weaknesses depending on the uniformity of the underlying surface. For instance, the area-weighted method is more suitable for homogeneous surfaces, whereas the weighted area-to-area regression kriging method is better for moderately heterogeneous surfaces, and the random forest method is more effective for highly heterogeneous surfaces. This variability requires a comparative study to determine the most appropriate method for obtaining accurate evapotranspiration data at the satellite pixel scale.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 表面的异质性影响不同上采样方法的适用性，因为每种方法在基础表面的均匀性方面具有不同的优缺点。例如，面积加权法更适合均匀表面，而加权面积到面积的回归克里金法更适合中等异质性表面，随机森林方法则在高度异质性表面上更有效。这种变异性需要进行比较研究，以确定在卫星像素尺度上获取准确蒸散发数据的最合适方法。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please provide an analysis of the effectiveness of different upscaling methods used for obtaining ground truth evapotranspiration data at satellite pixel scale over varying surface heterogeneities.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请提供对不同上采样方法在不同表面异质性下获取卫星像素尺度的真实蒸散发数据有效性的分析。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Based on a dataset from two flux observation matrices in the middle stream and downstream of the Heihe River Basin, six upscaling methods were intercompared. The area-weighted method performed better for homogeneous surfaces, the WATARK method for moderately heterogeneous surfaces, and the RF method for highly heterogeneous surfaces.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 根据来自黑河流域中游和下游的两个通量观测矩阵的数据集，对六种上尺度方法进行了比较。面积加权法在均匀表面上表现更好，WATARK方法在中等异质表面上表现更好，而随机森林（RF）方法在高度异质表面上表现最佳。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the challenges associated with the spatial-scale mismatch between in situ measurements and remotely sensed evapotranspiration products, and how these challenges are addressed.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn:
与现场测量和遥感蒸散发产品之间的空间尺度不匹配相关的挑战包括：1）不同空间分辨率导致数据不一致，可能影响蒸散发估算的准确性；2）现场测量通常在较小的区域进行，而遥感产品覆盖更广泛的区域，可能无法捕捉局部变化；3）时间尺度的差异，现场测量可能是瞬时的，而遥感产品通常是基于时间序列的平均值。

为了解决这些挑战，研究人员采用了多种方法，包括：1）使用插值技术将现场数据扩展到更大区域，以提高与遥感数据的兼容性；2）开发混合模型，将现场测量与遥感数据结合，以提高估算的准确性；3）利用高分辨率遥感数据，增强对局部变化的捕捉能力；4）进行长期监测和数据融合，以改善时间尺度的一致性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The spatial-scale mismatch between in situ measurements and remotely sensed evapotranspiration products is a major challenge, especially due to the heterogeneity of subpixels which impacts validation results. Selecting appropriate validation pixels and comparing various upscaling methods helps address these challenges.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 现场测量与遥感蒸散发产品之间的空间尺度不匹配是一个主要挑战，尤其是由于子像素的异质性影响了验证结果。选择合适的验证像素并比较各种上采样方法有助于解决这些挑战。
